contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Tabuse |JapaneseName= 田布施町 |settlement_type=Town |MapImage= Tabuse in Yamaguchi Prefecture Ja.svg |Region=[[Chūgoku region|Chūgoku]] ([[San'yō region|San'yō]]) |Prefecture=[[Yamaguchi prefecture|Yamaguchi]] |District=[[Kumage District, Yamaguchi|Kumage]] |Area_km2= 50.35 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 16,354 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 33 |LatitudeMinutes= 57 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 132 |LongtitudeMinutes= 2 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= Flag of Tabuse Yamaguchi.JPG |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.tabuse.lg.jp/ Town of Tabuse] }} {{nihongo|'''Tabuse'''|田布施町|Tabuse-chō}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kumage District, Yamaguchi|Kumage District]], [[Yamaguchi Prefecture|Yamaguchi]], [[Japan]]. In 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 16,354 and a [[population density|density]] of 324.81 persons per km². The total area is 50.35 km². ==Famous people== *[[Nobusuke Kishi]] *[[Eisaku Satō]] ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.town.tabuse.lg.jp/ Tabuse official website] {{ja icon}} {{Yamaguchi}} [[Category:Towns in Yamaguchi Prefecture]] [[Category:Tabuse, Yamaguchi| ]] {{Yamaguchi-geo-stub}}
